TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content:
I say we mix the two and do a #HypeBlimp, steam for the train people, and air for the plane people.

Hype-powered flight is IMPOSSIBLE! It's been tried over and over by the smartest of HypeEngineers, but they can't make it work! It wouldn't even have the capacity of the HypeTrain!!

Hype-powered flight is IMPOSSIBLE! It's been tried over and over by the smartest of HypeEngineers, but they can't make it work! It wouldn't even have the capacity of the HypeTrain!!

A HypeBalloon filled with HypeGas would be much lighter than air.
What if the secret feature is an in game hypetrain/plane!

A HypeBalloon filled with HypeGas would be much lighter than air.

HypeGas is just a hypothetical substance! No modern HypeTechnology has been able to produce it in any quantity!

And, of course, what happens if a hypothetical Hype-powered aircraft were created? It would fall out of the sky if the Hype went down!

What if the secret feature is an in game hypetrain/plane!

Doubt it,but could possibly be true

Hype-powered flight is IMPOSSIBLE! It's been tried over and over by the smartest of HypeEngineers, but they can't make it work! It wouldn't even have the capacity of the HypeTrain!!

Your incessant stating of falsehoods does not make them true. At Hypeodyne they purport to have a Jumbo Hypejet capable of flying not just all the passengers of the 0.24 HypeTrain, but the train itself.

And, of course, what happens if a hypothetical Hype-powered aircraft were created? It would fall out of the sky if the Hype went down!

That's why they're working on a Hypocopter. They Hype-gyros spin down slowly to allow for a controlled, safe landing in the event of a suddent hype decrease.
So is it gonna be released in the next few days? I call Saturday!

Hype-powered flight is IMPOSSIBLE! It's been tried over and over by the smartest of HypeEngineers, but they can't make it work! It wouldn't even have the capacity of the HypeTrain!!

You're just trying to suppress the technology so everyone will ride the HypeTrain! A proper HypePlane would put you out of business!

HypeGas is just a hypothetical substance! No modern HypeTechnology has been able to produce it in any quantity!

And, of course, what happens if a hypothetical Hype-powered aircraft were created? It would fall out of the sky if the Hype went down!

Hype is (KSPFans) + (KSPForum) + (UpdateImminent) = Hype. Which can be refined in to HypeGas, or HypeLiquid, the latter being used for HypeJets.

You're just trying to suppress the technology so everyone will ride the HypeTrain! A proper HypePlane would put you out of business!

No such vehicle exists! You're all scams if you're tricking people intoboarding a Turbojet or SABRE/RAPIER powerd "Hype"Plane!

- - - Updated - - -

Hype is the product of (KSPFans) + (KSPForum) + (UpdateImminent) = Hype. Which can be refined in to HypeGas, or HypeLiquid, the latter being used for HypeJets.

Hype Jets are impossible. Your theory of HypeProduction is incorrect!

- - - Updated - - -

Your incessant stating of falsehoods does not make them true. At Hypeodyne they purport to have a Jumbo Hypejet capable of flying not just all the passengers of the 0.24 HypeTrain, but the train itself.

No such thing could exist!
I forgot the -(Productivity).
HOLY DU*K-ING POOP! I'M SO HYPEEEEEED!!@#!$!11 I'm busting in the HYPE train, Here have 7 cookies, keep the change!

HOLY DU*K-ING POOP! I'M SO HYPEEEEEED!!@#!$!11 I'm busting in the HYPE train, Here have 7 cookies, keep the change!

6 free HypeTrain tickets!
Oh, wait, I found what we're looking for.

Oh, wait, I found what we're looking for.

https://encrypted-tbn2.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRzJDK-piVhkCewTMEJpHgAtYvywV_QQ4YuxgqT2abXQTwTph_Lkw

So you're the pilot of the HypeScamPlane? Looks like I have an enemy greater than that guy who keeps sending Creepers on the train.

- - - Updated - - -

pays gregroxmun in cookies,And Asks him to look at his friends requests!

Don't know you, rejected friend request, please use the Personal Message (P.M.) in the future.
I'm cheaper. You can buy tickets for the HypePlane for only one hug.

I'm cheaper. You can buy tickets for the HypePlane for only one hug.

HypeTrain tickets are now free. (Also, I heard that a secret part of being a Jedi is that you have to get infected with anti-hype cooties. Just sayin'.)
Negative numbers--we give you money. One day only!
The hypetrain now pays you to ride... in hype.

Hype-powered flight is IMPOSSIBLE! It's been tried over and over by the smartest of HypeEngineers, but they can't make it work! It wouldn't even have the capacity of the HypeTrain!!

No such vehicle exists! You're all scams if you're tricking people intoboarding a Turbojet or SABRE/RAPIER powerd "Hype"Plane

Hype Jets are impossible. Your theory of HypeProduction is incorrect!

No such thing could exist!

Hype (in the context of a resource with which to power a vehicle) is, in itself, a product of our minds, therefore, any hype derivative we produce with our minds is equally as "real" as the original hype-as-fuel concept is.

Aircrafts might be compatible between versions.

Thats what I hoping for. Im sure the hype vehicle will crash and burn if crafts are not compatible
All HypeTrain Tickets will now cost you negative eighty fortunes! Ride the HypeTrain, get rich!

Thats what I hoping for. Im sure the hype vehicle will crash and burn if crafts are not compatible

It's an early access game. You expect things to get broken in a version change.

All HypeTrain Tickets will now cost you negative eighty fortunes! Ride the HypeTrain, get rich!

What currency?
